sentences.en: ...a man of icy nerve and iron will.
sentences.cn: …一个头脑冷静、意志坚强的男人。

sentences.en: a driveway with large iron gates
sentences.cn: 安装了大铁门的私家车道

sentences.en: All their beds were distinctive; Mac'swas an iron affair with brass knobs.
sentences.cn: 他们的床都各具特色；马克的床是张带球形黄铜柱头的铁家伙。

sentences.en: Chambermaids will bring an iron or hair dryer on request.
sentences.cn: 只要提出要求，清理房间的女服务员就会送来熨斗或电吹风。

sentences.en: Fascism's iron hand.
sentences.cn: 法西斯主义的高压手段。

sentences.en: has many irons in the fire this year.
sentences.cn: 今年有许多事要做

sentences.en: Have you ironed my shirt?
sentences.cn: 我的衬衫你熨过了吗？

sentences.en: He felt the hardness of the iron railing press against his spine.
sentences.cn: 他感觉到硬邦邦的铁栏杆顶着自己的脊梁。

sentences.en: He was a tall, lanky man with iron-grey hair.
sentences.cn: 他是个瘦高个子，一头铁灰色头发。

sentences.en: He went to prison for receiving stolen scrap iron.
sentences.cn: 他因为收购偷来的废铁而入狱。

sentences.en: Iron and folic acid supplements are frequently given to pregnant women.
sentences.cn: 铁剂和叶酸片常被配给孕妇服用。

sentences.en: Mills have iron pillars all over the place holding up the roof.
sentences.cn: 工厂里四处都立有铁柱支撑着房顶。

sentences.en: Some would call these odd pieces of iron and wood "antiques"
sentences.cn: 有些人会把这些奇怪的铁片与木块称作“古董”。

sentences.en: the absorption of iron from food
sentences.cn: 对食物中铁的吸收

sentences.en: the iron and steel industry
sentences.cn: 钢铁工业

sentences.en: The iron teakettle was hissing splendidly over live coals.
sentences.cn: 煤火烧得正旺，上面的铁茶壶嘶嘶地响个不停。

sentences.en: The rattan and wrought-iron chair pictured here costs £125.
sentences.cn: 这张图片中的铁艺藤椅要价125英镑。

sentences.en: The small churchyard was surrounded by a rusted wrought-iron fence.
sentences.cn: 不大的教堂墓地周边围着一圈生锈的熟铁栅栏。

sentences.en: The various groups had now managed to iron out their differences.
sentences.cn: 各团体现在已努力消除了彼此间的分歧。

sentences.en: They would have to offer cast-iron guarantees to invest in long-term projects.
sentences.cn: 他们需提供绝对可靠的担保，才能投资长期项目。

sentences.en: Vitamin C increases the absorption of iron from food.
sentences.cn: 维生素C促进食物中铁的吸收。

sentences.en: We crossed a small iron bridge over a meandering stream.
sentences.cn: 我们穿过架在蜿蜒小河上的一座小铁桥。

words.tran_cn: 讽刺；反语；具有讽刺意味的事
坚定的,不屈服的,强大的
残酷的,无感情的,顽固的

phrases.phrase: an iron hand (或 fist) in a velvet glove

phrases.tran_cn: 球墨铸铁，延性铁；韧性铁

phrases.phrase: have many (或 other) irons in the fire
phrases.tran_cn: 同时有许多（或其他）事情要做
铁腕，严厉的手段；严格的控制；高压手段
正在进行的事情或项目
解决，消除：通过讨论或妥协来解决；消除

trans.tran_cn: 铁制的，含铁的，坚强的，顽强的，残酷的，坚忍不拔的
trans.tran_en: You can use iron to describe the character or behaviour of someone who is very firm in their decisions and actions, or who can control their feelings well

trans.tran_cn: 铁器，铁制品，熨斗，烙铁，坚强，脚镣
trans.tran_en: a common hard metal that is used to make steel, is  magnetic  , and is found in very small quantities in food and blood. It is a chemical  element  : symbol Fe
to make clothes smooth using an iron

trans.tran_cn: 熨烫，给…上脚镣手铐，给…装铁具，用铁铸成
